com.fbergeron.util
Class WindowManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
        |
        +--com.fbergeron.util.WindowManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener
public class WindowManager
extends java.awt.event.WindowAdapter

WindowManager is a Window Adapter that implements usual behavior when closing a window.

Field Summary
static int DISPOSE_ON_CLOSE
          Used in the constructor to specify to dispose the window when it's closing.
static int EXIT_ON_CLOSE
          Used in the constructor to specify to exit and terminate the application when the window when it's closing.
static int HIDE_ON_CLOSE
          Used in the constructor to specify to hide the window when it's closing.
 
Constructor Summary
WindowManager(java.awt.Window w, int action)
          Constructor for a WindowManager.
 
Method Summary
 void windowClosing(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
          Specifies what to do when the window is closing.

Constructor for a WindowManager.
